org.ow2.bonita.facade
Interface QueryAPIAccessor

All Known Subinterfaces:
APIAccessor, ServerAPIAccessor
All Known Implementing Classes:
EJB2APIAccessorImpl, EJB2QueryAPIAccessorImpl, EJB3APIAccessorImpl, EJB3QueryAPIAccessorImpl, RESTAPIAccessorImpl, RESTQueryAPIAccessorImpl, StandardAPIAccessorImpl, StandardQueryAPIAccessorImpl
public interface QueryAPIAccessor

Helper class giving access to BAMAPI, QueryDefinitionAPI and QueryRuntimeAPI interfaces.
